alert.note: Alert for Dunklin; Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 07 at 2:22PM CST until November 08 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 6 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arkansas, Clay, Greene, Craighead and Mississippi Counties. In Missouri, Dunklin and Pemiscot Counties. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 6 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized blowing dust could occur and reduce roadway visibility at times as fields have recently been plowed and/or burned.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
